title: Koku
summary: The koku (石) is a Chinese-based Japanese unit of volume. 1 koku is equivalent to 10 to (斗) or approximately 180 litres (40 imp gal; 48 US gal),[lower-alpha 1][1] or about 150 kilograms (330 lb). It converts, in turn, to 100 shō and 1000 gō.[2] One gō is the volume of the "rice cup", the plastic measuring cup that is supplied with commercial Japanese rice cookers.[3]
